text: Daniel Hector Bouchard (born December 12, 1950, in Val-d'Or, Quebec) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey goaltender. He played in the National Hockey League (NHL) with the Atlanta Flames, Calgary Flames, Quebec Nordiques, and Winnipeg Jets. ==Other websites== * * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Atlanta Flames players Category:Boston Braves (AHL) players Category:Calgary Flames players Category:Canadian ice hockey goaltenders Category:Hershey Bears players Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Quebec Nordiques players Category:Winnipeg Jets (1979â€“96) players Category:Quebec Major Junior Hockey League players Category:Ontario Hockey League players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Dan Bouchard
